amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce Navy Shipbuilding and Conversion procurement by $404 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 14 in the Congressional Record of June 12, 1996 to reduce the appropriation for Nave shipbuilding by $404 million. The purpose of the amendment is to eliminate funding for additional attack submarines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 285 (Roll no. 240).
